description: A popular bartender at the Cat's Tail tavern, Diona is known for her unique drinks and her ability to shield and heal her allies.
info: Diona is a top-tier shielder and healer for Freeze and Melt teams. Build her for HP% and Energy Recharge.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Kätzlein Style
skills.desc: Performs up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.
Charged Attack
Performs a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. A fully charged shot will deal Cryo DMG.
Plunging Attack
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Icy Paws
skills.desc: Fires an Icy Paw that deals Cryo DMG and creates a shield on hit. Shield strength scales with Diona's Max HP.
skills.details_html:
Icy Paws
Fires an Icy Paw that deals Cryo DMG and creates a shield. Shield strength scales with Diona's Max HP. Holding the skill increases shield strength and duration.

skills.name: Signature Mix
skills.desc: Tosses out a special cold brew that creates a Drunken Mist, dealing AoE Cryo DMG and continuously healing characters inside.
skills.details_html:
Signature Mix
Tosses out a special cold brew that creates a Drunken Mist, dealing AoE Cryo DMG and continuously healing characters inside. Healing scales with Diona's Max HP.

passive_talents.name: Cat's Tail Secret Menu
passive_talents.desc: Characters shielded by Icy Paws have their Movement SPD increased by 10% and their Stamina Consumption decreased by 10%.

passive_talents.name: Drunkards' Farce
passive_talents.desc: Opponents who enter the AoE of Signature Mix have their ATK decreased by 10% for 15s.

passive_talents.name: Complimentary Bar Food
passive_talents.desc: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, Diona has a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: A Lingering Flavor
constellations.desc: Regenerates 15 Energy for Diona after Signature Mix's effects end.

constellations.name: Shaken, Not Purred
constellations.desc: Increases Icy Paws' DMG by 15%, and increases shield duration by 6s.

constellations.name: A-Another Round?
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Signature Mix by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Wine Industry Slayer
constellations.desc: Within the radius of Signature Mix, Diona's charge time for aimed shots is reduced by 60%.

constellations.name: Double Shot, On The Rocks
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Icy Paws by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Cat's Tail Closing Time
constellations.desc: Characters within Signature Mix's radius will gain 30% Incoming Healing Bonus when their HP falls below or is equal to 50%.
